author: Joe Mama
content:
I don't know who this man is but the internet is creepy. 
4chan needs to be monitored. 
Found out "Loli" means pervs looking at kids in anime "art" form
Guess that's legal cause alot of people post on there. 
Needs to be illegal cause that will be a stepping stone for some.

And sex education in school should be just warning kids of predators and leave sex talk to the parents!
